Title: Directs the housing trust fund corporation to administer a New York small cities community development program
Summary: Directs the housing trust fund corporation to administer a New York small cities community development program to encourage the rehabilitation and repair of local housing in cities, as accounted in the most recent United State census, with a population less than one hundred thousand.
LawCode: Amd ยง45-a, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to directing the housing trust fund corporation to administer a New York small cities community development program
